post_detail.title: I Work at Click
post_detail.description:
My Contribution:

A veteran of the agency world, I joined the Click family to help strategically position the technology at the forefront finding innovative solutions to the diverse challenges of our clients. I am all about uncovering how things function and how to make them better. Fast, smart and creative with strong artistic sensibilities, I enjoy architecting digital campaign executions that require a multitude of interconnected technologies. I am equally comfortable diving deep into code or brainstorming creative ideas for a concept.

The Company:

In a constantly evolving landscape, ClickFire Media puts all the tools along with amazing creative and technology talent under one roof to create rich, innovative interactive experiences - with an assist from Click 3X and their deep and rich resources in video, audio, VFX and CGI. We use ground-breaking technology. We bend the rules of what's possible, and we create entirely new realities in the form of brand experiences that stick to the roof of your brain.
